title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 6 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 6 2022
description:
CNN reports that anonymous Democrat calls Biden "rudderless, aimless, and hopeless." Buck says he thinks the description will stick because, "I think that may be the most perfect three-word encapsulation of this White House I've ever heard." Tip Clay received: Democrat playbook 101 -- trying to push through massive tax increase, trillion-dollar spending bill before midterms. Even Jeff Bezos smacks down Biden's lack of knowledge about inflation. Buck says, "Biden is telling gas stations to go bankrupt." Peter Doocy grilled the White House on Joe Biden discussing business dealings with Hunter Biden on a voicemail. Update on Highland Park shooting: Suspect threatened to kill his family, had a criminal record, was known to police, and he dressed as a woman to escape. More Democrat playbook: Blame the gun. Clay says, "I know Joe Biden is old and not good at speaking, but Kamala Harris was supposed to be the future of the Democrat party."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
